t: Amazon Logo and symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The Amazon logo is composed of a wordmark “Amazon” in the lowercase letters. Under the lettering there is a smooth and bold yellow arrow, coming from the letter “A” to “Z”, forming a smile. The first versions of this emblem contained the “.com” part, but it was removed after ...

t: Amazon Smile Logo, symbol, meaning, history, PNG, brand
s: The most recognizable graphic symbol of the Amazon trademark is the grinning arrow. It is located under the first bold word. The line is shaped like an inverted arch, starting under the letter “a” and ending at “z.” The ends of the arcuate strip are narrow; the middle is wide.

t: Amazon Logo & Brand (Discover The Secrets Behind The Smile)
s: March 13, 2024 - The brand name was made bold to enhance visibility, keeping the “.com” portion lighter. With the onset of the new millennium, the Amazon logo finally got its staple appearance, one that we know today. The yellow swish was extended to seem like a smile under the brand name.
